Name:
Caprice
Honesty
Builder: Kingston Shipbuilding Co., Kingston, Ontario, Canada
Fate:
Transferred to the Royal Navy, 28 May 1943
Returned to US custody, 5 January 1946
Status: Sold 10 December 1946; Scrapped at Hamburg, Germany in 1961
Armament:
2 × 3"/50 dual purpose gun mounts
2 × 20 mm gun mounts
1 × Hedgehog
4 × depth charge guns
2 × depth charge chutes
